snippet: In return for thousands of dollars, a Fire Department employee who supervised safety inspections overlooked violations that put children at risk.
abstract: Former New York Fire Department employee Carlos Montoya is sentenced to two and a half years in prison for accepting thousands of dollars in bribes from day care center operators in return for overlooking violations and not performing inspections.
lead_paragraph: In return for thousands of dollars, a Fire Department employee who supervised safety inspections overlooked violations that put children at risk.

headline.seo: Inspector of Day Care Centers Gets 2 ½ Years in Bribetaking Case
headline.main: Inspector of Day Care Centers Gets 2½ Years in Bribetaking Case
headline.print_headline: Inspector of Day Care Centers Gets 2 ½ Years in Bribery Case
